title: Convenient two-step method constructed silicon-based microfluidic chip for fast CYP2C19 SNPs detection
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,26007-26015

Silicon-based qPCR chips are used for the rapid and efficient detection of SNPs with the same accuracy as commercial PCR instruments.
